lenders.name: Lori Webb
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and have spent a great deal of my life personally and professionally nurturing and encouraging that spirit..

Through Kiva, I am not only able to support the entrepreneurial spirit but, am able to contribute to a global movement that empowers people to positively impact the quality of life for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide people with resources, knowledge, techniques, motivation and support  to provoke new thinking and encourage entrepreneurial behavior. I began my Entrepreneurial Profiles project because the diversity of entrepreneurs and the entrepreneurial spirit were not being represented enough for my liking. And I subsequently created Elevateher because I found that there was especially limited representation, focus and support for  women.

lenders.loan_because: I have travelled extensively and have a Master degree in Development Studies and have seen first hand the difficulties of obtaining finance to get ahead in life. In the West new business start ups often re-mortgage a house or obtain a loan from a bank. Imagine if you couldnt do this? Obtaining a £20,000 loan for a small business from friends and family in the UK is like a person on Kiva obtaining $100. Virtually impossible without very wealthy friends-which not many of us have - do you?
